text:
[Verse]
City lights they shine so bright
Neon signs paint the night
Sidewalks hum and hearts collide
In the glow where secrets hide

[Verse 2]
Dancing shadows play their part
Pulsing beats quicken the heart
Lost in rhythm energy's high
Underneath the urban sky

[Chorus]
Neon dreams electric stream
Life's a song in vivid beams
We all chase what we can't see
Living in this fantasy

[Verse 3]
Crowded streets yet so alone
Finding love through text and phone
Searching faces in the crowd
Hoping someone calls out loud

[Bridge]
In the chaos we find peace
In the noise our souls release
Holding on to fleeting sparks
Glowing bright against the dark

[Chorus]
Neon dreams electric stream
Life's a song in vivid beams
We all chase what we can't see
Living in this fantasy
title: Neon Dreams
